instructions: Long press on one of your home screens. Tap the Home screen option that appears below. Toggle off the Add icon to Home screen Android settings option.
Open the Android settings menu. Tap on Google. Select Ads. Tap the Opt out of Ads Personalization option.
Open the settings menu. Tap on Google. Select Instant Apps. Select the Google account to use with the feature.
Open the settings menu. Tap on Battery. Select Battery optimizations. Tap on an app and select Don t optimize to turn off Doze.
Open the Andriod settings menu. Tap on Notifications. Select the gear icon in the top-right corner. Tap On the lock screen followed by Hide sensitive notification content.
